title: Love at the Thanksgiving Day Parade
actors: Autumn Reeser, Antonio Cupo, April Telek, Ben Cotton
plot: As Chicago gears up for its annual Thanksgiving Day parade, Emily Jones, an eager parade coordinator is shocked when Henry Williams, a wealthy new development consultant, is brought in to analyze the parade's finances. Faced with the challenge of teaching him that the parade means so much more to her than dollar signs, she suddenly finds herself reluctantly falling for him.
